source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_00<tab>Broken Mountain has some concerns about his brother.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_00<tab>Broken Mountain s'inquiète pour son petit frère...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_01<tab>Broken Mountain gives news of Curious Gorge, who has joined the Maelstrom's defensive operations against the kobolds in hopes of training against live enemies. Even though he wants nothing more than to improve, it seems his fear of losing control once again is keeping him from fighting with all his strength. In order to serve as an example to Curious Gorge, and future warriors, Broken Mountain tells you to follow in Mythril Heart's footsteps by hunting the fearsome grizzly bears inhabiting Abalathia's Spine. Go to Tailfeather in the Dravanian forelands and ask the hunters there for any information that might help you track down these colossal creatures.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_01<tab>Broken Mountain s'inquiète pour Curious Gorge, dont les performances au combat semblent assez médiocres depuis que sa rage l'a poussé à vous attaquer. Il pense que si vous arrivez à acquérir les techniques de Mythril Heart, il retrouvera sa motivation et reviendra à son meilleur niveau. Allez à La Penne, dans l'Avant-pays dravanien, et interrogez des chasseurs pour obtenir des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur la bête dont vous a parlé Broken Mountain.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_02<tab>The hunters at Tailfeather share stories of the massive grizzlies, none of them encouraging. One hunter begrudgingly informs you that some have been known to lure the bears out with Whilom salmon, which can be found at the northwestern part of the Whilom River. Go to the riverbanks and gather any fish you can find.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez interrogé plusieurs chasseurs et avez obtenu des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions utiles qui devraient vous permettre d'attirer le grizzli jusqu'à vous. Allez à l'endroit indiqué au nord-ouest de la rivière Vairlame et procurez-vous un saumon.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_03<tab>The hunter's advice was sound, and you have found enough fish to draw one of the beasts out from hiding. Go to the Hundred Throes and use the Whilom salmon to draw a grizzly out, then slay one of them in its watering hole.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez votre saumon. À présent, allez aux Cent Râles et déposez-le à l'endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_04<tab>You have defeated a fearsome Whilom grizzly, as Mythril Heart before you, and the pitched battle awakens your inner beast from its slumber. Return to Camp Bronze Lake and inform Broken Mountain of your deeds.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez vaincu le grizzli de Vairlame, l'ours immense que Mythril Heart a affronté autrefois. Retournez au camp du lac d'Airain et faites un rapport à Broken Mountain.

source:
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_05<tab>Upon returning to Camp Bronze Lake, Curious Gorge enthusiastically informs you of the Maelstrom's successful defense against the kobold attacks, and returns to train for his next mission. However, Wheiskaet has a different story. Although the operation succeeded, it seems Curious Gorge remains frightened of losing control in battle. With the beast tribes growing bolder by the day, there is little hope for the Maelstrom to take warriors seriously if Curious Gorge continues to underperform. Broken Mountain will continue to do research into how to tame the inner beast and encourages you to continue your training in preparation for the next step.

※The next warrior quest will be available from Broken Mountain upon reaching level 56.
target:
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_SEQ_05<tab>Bien qu'il fasse le fanfaron, Curious Gorge vit en réalité très mal la situation actuelle. Il a tellement peur que sa bête intérieure prenne le dessus qu'il n'arrive plus à combattre au maximum de ses capacités... Alors que vous vous apprêtiez à raconter votre bataille contre le grizzli de Vairlame, votre bête intérieure s'est déchaînée à son tour, vous révélant une nouvelle technique de combat. Broken Mountain sait dorénavant que sa théorie est correcte et il va pouvoir poursuivre sa lecture du Traité. Arrivera-t-il à trouver une méthode qui permettra à Curious Gorge de contrôler sa rage<var 1D /var>? Seul le temps le dira.
* Broken Mountain propose la prochaine quête aux guerriers de niveau 56.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the hunters at Tailfeather.
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_TODO_01<tab>Obtain Whilom salmon from the designated location.
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_TODO_02<tab>Use the salmon at the designated location and slay the bear.
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_TODO_03<tab>Report to Broken Mountain at Camp Bronze Lake.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_TODO_03<tab>Faire un rapport à Broken Mountain

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000<tab>Well met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It seems your trials have prepared you for the next step down your long path.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_000<tab>Tiens, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Ton en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment semble porter ses fruits, tu m'as l'air beaucoup plus robuste que la dernière fois.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001<tab>However, while <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> progress is truly remarkable, I'm afraid my brother still fears the fury of his inner beast. Even in the training yard, he swings his axe with hesitation.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_001<tab>Tu sais, Curious Gorge a très mal vécu l'épisode de l'autre jour. Il a tellement peur de se laisser dévorer par sa bête intérieure qu'il n'ose plus se battre de toutes ses forces.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_002<tab>Seeking to test himself against live foes, he has joined the Maelstrom's efforts to repel a recent spate of kobold attacks. However, Wheiskaet has sent word that his ferocity on the field of battle is not what it once was.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_002<tab>Il participe ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment à une mission avec le Maelstrom, mais ça ne se passe pas très bien d'après ce que j'ai entendu dire.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_003<tab>My brother has long admired your will. Test your axe against ever stronger adversaries and master the techniques of eld, and by doing so serve to inspire him and all who aspire to walk the path of the warrior.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_003<tab>Je crois que le meilleur moyen de le remotiver, c'est de lui montrer qu'il peut s'améliorer en travaillant dur, comme toi.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_004<tab>Remember the words set forth in the ancient tomes, and seek foes that test the very limits of your mind and body. The heat of battle will awaken the beast within, bestowing upon you the knowledge of our ancestors.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_004<tab>Tu te souviens du poème du Traité<var 1D /var>? “Vaillant combattant, d'un grand danger triomphant, les limites transcendant”. Si tu le veux bien, j'aimerais te proposer de mettre cet en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ment en pratique.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_005<tab>Luckily, the path you walk has been tread on before, and you need not wander the land aimlessly. According to the tomes, Mythril Heart once spent a season hunting the hulking grizzly bears that stalk Abalathia's Spine, the largest of which are said to rival even a behemoth in size.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_005<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, j'ai déjà trouvé l'adversaire parfait pour toi. Il s'agit d'une bête que Mythril Heart a affrontée autrefois<var 1D /var>: le grizzli de Vairlame. Je sais qu'il rôde ha<var 16 /var>bi<var 16 /var>tuel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment dans les montagnes de Dravania, mais j'ignore où précisément.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011<tab>Make your way to Tailfeather, home to many seasoned hunters that know the lay of the land and of the creatures inhabiting it. Find the beasts of Mythril Heart's hunt and test yourself against their razor claws as he did.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_011<tab>Les chasseurs du village de La Penne pourront cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment te donner plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions. Commence donc par les interroger.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_019<tab>The techniques of eld are within your grasp, but only if you can transcend the limits of your mind and body.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_019<tab>Si tu arrives à apprendre les techniques de combat de Mythril Heart, Curious Gorge retrouvera sans doute son niveau d'avant l'incident. Je compte sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_019<tab>Each meeting with you, I'm humbled anew. I'll continue my own training, so that one day we may meet as peers.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_019<tab>Comment s'passe ton en<var 16 /var>traî<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? Tu fais des progrès<var 1D /var>? J'ai peut-être pas l'air comme ça, mais j'm'entraîne dur, moi aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_REMACLON_000_020<tab>Ask any hunter 'round here about the grizzlies of Abalathia's Spine and they're like to tell you the same thing: if you see one, run.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_REMACLON_000_020<tab>Un ours géant<var 1D /var>? Ah, vous voulez sans doute parler du grizzli de Vairlame. Cet animal est bien connu des chasseurs du coin, et pour cause, puisqu'il en a tué des dizaines. Un conseil d'ami<var 1D /var>: si jamais vous l'apercevez, prenez vos jambes à votre cou<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_REMACLON_000_025<tab>Plenty o' green adventurers come 'round here asking about the beasts of Abalathia's Spine. Few come back from their hunt.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_REMACLON_000_025<tab>Cet ours a déjà tué des dizaines de chasseurs. Certains disent qu'il ne faisait que se défendre, mais moi je pense qu'il a pris goût à la viande humaine...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_LOUISONET_000_020<tab>Aye, I can hardly forget the size of the beast I saw that day. I was tracking a chocobo 'round the Hundred Throes, when I spotted a bear near big as a house, drinkin' its fill from the waters. I didn't dare get any closer, and went home from that day's hunt empty-handed.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_LOUISONET_000_020<tab>Figurez-vous que je suis déjà tombé nez à nez avec cet ours, il y a quelques lunes. J'étais en train de chasser un chocobo sauvage près des Cent Râles, quand tout à coup il a surgi de nulle part. Il était si grand qu'on aurait dit un goobbue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_LOUISONET_000_025<tab>You can't convince me to go back to the Hundred Throes again, even if there was a whole herd of chocobos over there.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_LOUISONET_000_025<tab>Faites bien attention si jamais vous allez aux Cent Râles. Cet ours est très agressif<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_020<tab>You're a right fool if you're thinkin' of goin' after one of those massive beasts alone─best bring about a dozen friends along if you wanna come back in one piece.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_020<tab>Ah, je vois. Vous êtes de ceux que la mort n'effraie pas... Si vous tenez tant à vous faire réduire en charpie, vous n'avez qu'à essayer de l'attirer avec du saumon.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_021<tab>If you've got the men, then I've heard of huntin' parties usin' Whilom salmon to draw 'em out. If you head up the Whilom River, you're like to find a few what died durin' the salmon run.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_021<tab>Vous avez de la chance, c'est pile la saison pour en trouver. Les femelles remontent ac<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>el<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment la rivière Vairlame pour aller pondre. Bon courage, vous allez en avoir besoin.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_025<tab>Some of the huntin' parties comin' through here have used Whilom salmon to lure out the beasts.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_025<tab>Le grizzli que vous cherchez adore les saumons. Vous pourrez vous en procurer à la rivière Vairlame.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_PRIORFAIX_000_026<tab>'Course, once you lure one out, then you've gotta kill it. Can't give you much advice on that part.
TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_029<tab>Broken Mountain told me of the daring hunt you set out upon. I'd like to hear about it─sounds like it's the type of story that'll get our blood flowing!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_029<tab>Broken Mountain m'a dit que tu étais parti<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> affronter une bête féroce. Il me tarde d'entendre ton rapport.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029<tab>Wheiskaet and I have just returned from our duties in La Noscea. The cowardly kobolds never stood a chance! A dip in the hot springs seems a just reward for our bravery.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_029<tab>J'viens juste de finir ma mission avec le Maelstrom. On a cassé du Kobold à tout va, c'était génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_030<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, welcome back. My brother and Wheiskaet were just telling me of the Maelstrom's successes in La Noscea.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_030<tab>Ah, te revoilà... sain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> et sau<var 08 E905 ((ve)) ((f)) /var> par-dessus le marché<var 1D /var>! Mon frère aussi a terminé sa mission avec le Maelstrom. Il est venu avec messire Wheiskaet pour me raconter comment ça s'est passé.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>Aye, the kobolds scattered as frightened mice before our wrath. I daresay they'll think twice before setting foot on Lominsan soil again!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_031<tab>J'ai cassé du Kobold à tout va<var 1D /var>! Du grand Curious Gorge<var 1D /var>! Franchement, j'crois qu'la moitié des soldats seraient morts si j'avais pas été là<var 1D /var>! Hé hé hé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, as eager as I am to hear of your journey to Abalathia's Spine, I can't afford to waste any more time away from my training. The kobolds may be licking their wounds for now, but they'll be back, and in greater numbers. Till next we meet.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_CURIOUSGORGE_000_032<tab>Bon, j'vous laisse. J'dois me préparer pour notre prochaine sortie. À la revoyure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_033<tab><sigh> Curious Gorge has acted in high spirits since our return from Limsa Lominsa, but his bravado scarcely hides the truth.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_033<tab>Il fait le fanfaron, mais au fond de lui il est dépité...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_034<tab>What he said was true─our operations against the kobolds were a resounding success. However, troops that fought alongside him say that Curious Gorge was noticeably shaken during the battle, as if afraid the tide would turn at a moment's notice.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_034<tab>C'est vrai qu'il a joué un rôle essentiel dans la mission, mais les soldats qui l'accompagnaient m'ont dit qu'il n'avait pas la même fougue que d'habitude.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_035<tab>But it was not fear of the kobolds that caused his axe to waver. He still fears his own inner beast. As long as this fear has hold of him in battle, then there is little hope that he will grow as a warrior...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_035<tab>Il a tellement peur que sa bête intérieure prenne le dessus qu'il retient ses coups... Il ne pourra jamais progresser s'il continue comme ça.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_036<tab>The kobolds become bolder with each passing day, and the Maelstrom's forces are spread too thin. Maelstrom Command is desperately seeking ways to supplement its flagging troops.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_036<tab>Les Kobolds sont de plus en plus agressifs ces temps-ci, et le Maelstrom  cherche une solution définitive à ce problème.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_037<tab>They're considering bolstering fighting strength by training troops in warrior techniques, so Curious Gorge's capabilities have come under special scrutiny. However, if fear continues to hold him back, I doubt he'll manage to impress anyone.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_037<tab>À ce qu'on raconte, leur état-major étudierait la possibilité d'incorporer des guerriers dans leurs rangs. Toutefois, au vu des piètres performances de Curious Gorge, j'ai peur qu'ils reviennent sur leur décision...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_038<tab>Once again, we are left wanting for a means to tame the inner beast...
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_038<tab>Si seulement on pouvait l'aider à dompter sa bête intérieure...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab>...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was there naught learned from your journey to the Dravanian forelands that could be of aid?
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_039<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, est-ce que tu as découvert quelque chose lors de ton combat<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_041<tab>...Ah, and in the same manner as before, the memories of battle have roused the inner beast.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_041<tab>... Hein<var 1D /var>? Le fait de te remémorer ton duel contre le grizzli a déchaîné ta bête intérieure<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_042<tab>So my theory was correct: the key to mastery lies in the heat of conflict. Just as the ancient tomes say, only victory against a worthy opponent can temper the inner beast.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_042<tab>Mon analyse du Traité était donc correcte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, your growth as a warrior has given us valuable insight into the true nature of the inner beast. However, there is still much that remains shrouded in mystery.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_043<tab>Grâce à toi, je comprends de mieux en mieux cette force...

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_044<tab>And there's still the question of what exactly sets <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> apart from your brother.
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_WHEISKAET_000_044<tab>J'espère que tu trouveras la raison pour laquelle <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> arrive à la contrôler et pas ton frère.

source: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_050<tab>Indeed. The tools to tame the beast within are hidden somewhere─I just have yet to find them. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, continue with your training while I return to the tomes. A solution will present itself soon enough!
target: TEXT_JOBWAR540_00588_BROKENMOUNTAIN_000_050<tab>La réponse est cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment dans le Traité. Je vais m'y replonger im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tes progrès sont indéniables. Continue à t'entraîner et reviens me voir dans quelques jours.
